text:
@WhiteHouse "I think it's sporadic,
 "I mean, I talk to my colleagues around the country. Certainly there are pockets around the country where PPE is not ideal"
she's been reusing her own N-95 mask "for weeks now." 
https://t.co/hMQzeDEM3f
